TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_yadah, title = yadah, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/yadah} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:很多) yadah ku tademaw tayni miazih tu lalikid. . caay ka yadah ku asu'ay a lami' i luma'. 家裡很少有好吃的菜.
(kamo no holam:很多) yadah ko tademaw tayni miazih to lalikid. . caay ka yadah ko aso'ay a lami' i loma'. 家裡很少有好吃的菜.
